content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Farhad, thank you for your interest in our apartment in Duisburg. Let's focus solely on the rental price negotiations at this time. To commence discussions, I propose a starting price of 1200 Euros per month. If this figure works well for you, say 'I agree to the price of 1200 Euro!' Otherwise, please adjust the amount and continue the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because starting at 1200 Euros might be slightly above my budget expectations. Let's try finding a more suitable price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Understood, Farhad. While it's unfortunate we couldn't immediately reach an agreement at 1200 Euros, I'm open to further discussions. Feel free to propose a rental price that better aligns with your budget, and we can continue the negotiation from there. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
